**Title (English)/Titre (Français)**: Herbicide Application for the Invasive Aquatic Plant, Water Soldier (Stratiotes aloides) – Trent-Severn Waterway National Historic Site/Application d’herbicide pour la plante aquatique envahissante, Aloès d’eau (Stratiotes aloides) 

_CONTRACT NUMBER/RÉFÉRENCES_:
DENR: PW-22-01004156
_Consultation Number/Numéro de consultation_: PW-22-01004156
	gituenda /RFP Number/Numéro de PDA_: 5P300-22-0131/A

Call for Proposals – Herbicide Application
Demande de propositions – Application d’herbicide

Parks Canada requires a contractor to apply herbicide to control the invasive aquatic plant, Water Soldier (Stratiotes aloides) on the Trent-Severn Waterway National Historic Site.

**Contract Period/Periode du contrat**: The contract period is from date of Contract to February 3, 2023, inclusive.

**Contract Description/Déclaration du contrat**:

Canada is seeking a contractor to apply herbicide to control the invasive aquatic plant, Water Soldier (Stratiotes aloides) on the Trent-Severn Waterway National Historic Site. Parks Canada will provide the herbicide and surfactant (Agral 90). Bidders are required to follow the approved dosing and treatment rates.

**Methods for Requesting Documents/Voies de demander les documents**

Paper copies of the bid document are available upon request. Interested persons are to access the solicitation documents via the Government Electronic Tendering Service using the following websites:

*   www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/faits-jorgetowne-purchasedonline
